original_text: Good people are upset, when they see what is happening to me. They are angry with those who turn away from you. Good people are upset,
korean_text: 정직한 자는 이로 말미암아 놀라고 죄 없는 자는 경건하지 못한 자 때문에 분을 내나니

sentences.original_text: when they see what is happening to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내게 일어나는 일을 볼 때

sentences.original_text: They are angry with those who turn away from you
